h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
content: If you're tired of hopping from shrine to shrine to see NPCs, or you're wondering how to upgrade armor in Black Myth: Wukong, then Zodiac Village is the place for you. This central hub for NPCs can be unlocked in Chapter 3 and will introduce a new smithing character to cater to all your armor and weapon needs, along with additional perks from those you've already met.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor'.
The content is as follows:
If you're tired of hopping from shrine to shrine to see NPCs, or you're wondering how to upgrade armor in Black Myth: Wukong, then Zodiac Village is the place for you. This central hub for NPCs can be unlocked in Chapter 3 and will introduce a new smithing character to cater to all your armor and weapon needs, along with additional perks from those you've already met.
